benchmark_details.name: Sentimental LIAR
benchmark_details.overview: Sentimental LIAR extends the LIAR dataset by adding features based on sentiment and emotion analysis of claims. It aims to automate the detection of false short-text claims on social media using advanced deep learning architectures.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enhance automated detection of fake claims on social media by providing a new benchmark dataset with additional features that improve classification accuracy.

data.source: Extended from the LIAR dataset, augmented with sentiment and emotion attributes through existing NLP APIs.
data.annotation: Annotated with binary labels for true or false claims derived from original LIAR multi-class labels.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on model predictions compared to ground truth labels in the dataset.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy and F1 scores indicate better performance in detecting fake claims.
